tool_description: Assesses medical emergency severity using standardized triage protocols and assigns priority levels for dispatch decisions.

consciousness_level.description: Patient consciousness: alert, verbal, pain, unresponsive

error_messages: Invalid consciousness level: Use alert, verbal, pain, or unresponsive
Invalid breathing status: Use normal, difficulty, or absent
Invalid patient age: Must be between 0 and 120 years
Missing chief complaint: Provide specific medical complaint or symptom description
Incomplete assessment: All required medical indicators must be provided
usage: Provide patient medical information to receive standardized triage assessment and priority assignment.

recommended_response.description: Recommended response type: als_ambulance, bls_ambulance, first_responder
